item.description:
Would you like to start preserving fruit, pickles, herbs and tomatoes from your garden or the local summer bounty? Come learn about boiling-water-bath canning and dehydrating with two veteran food preservers in Petersham on Saturday, May 11. The Petersham Local Food Group is sponsoring this hands-on class. If you've been wanting to learn about water-bath canning and dehydrating, come to the class and make this the year you get started.

Anyone can register for the class, but space is limited. Sign up soon!

When: Saturday May 11, 10:30am until about 12:30
Where: 87 Maple Lane, Petersham, 
Cost: $15 per student - Class fees (in excess of supplies) will be donated to the Petersham Local Food Group for future programs.
item.name: Food Preservation Class - Canning and Dehydrating (in Central Mass)
